ValidationRule.description: Early Pay Tiers can be deleted, but values cannot be edited.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: ISPICKVAL(Election__c,' Weekly Billing/Weekly Payment - 13 basis points (0.13%)') && OR( SBQQ__LowerBound__c <> 9, SBQQ__UpperBound__c <> 13, Basis_Points__c <> 13 )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Early Pay Tiers can be deleted, but values cannot be edited.
